content.name: UT CaC Option - Energy Fuel Storage
content.description: Changes dedicted Energy Storages that they can also Store Fuel to Streamline Refueling with the UT CaC Manager
content.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Option - Energy Fuel Storage
text.description: Changes dedicted Energy Storages that they can also Store Fuel to Streamline Refueling with the UT CaC Manager
text.author: UniTrader

text.name: UT CaC Option - Sprit+Energielager
text.description: Ändert die speziellen Energielager in kombinierte Energie- und Spritlager um das nachtanken mit UT CaC-Managern zu vereinfachen
text.author: UniTrader
